tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  touchpoint TEXT,
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_journey (
  customer_id INT,
  journey_stage INT,
  touchpoint_id INT,
  interaction_date DATE,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  feedback VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_channel VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE touchpoints (
    touchpoint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    touchpoint_name VARCHAR(50),
    touchpoint_type VARCHAR(50),
    touchpoint_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_profile (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_rating INT,
    feedback_datetime TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customer_purchase_history (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    purchase_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_touchpoints (
    customer_id INT,
    touchpoint_id INT,
    interaction_id INT,
    interaction_outcome VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (touchpoint_id) REFERENCES touchpoints(touchpoint_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (interaction_id) REFERENCES interactions(interaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);
